summary: Mix of Skyrim Mods With My Configurations.
descriptionHtml:
This Overhaul completely changes your files. I've looked everywhere to find the best
mods and configurations that I could online for a few years now, then I tried them all out in 
different ways to find the type of Skyrim I wanted it to feel like. There's several bug 
fixes and gameplay features were never fixed or added in the update. So here's New animated 
movements and abilities that make the game feel better but still vanilla. Better 
visuals on everything without ruining performance. I know it's a lot to read but 
its really simple. (Also already cracked and updated).

As long as you have Skyrim correctly installed through steam or manually this 
will work.

So first, you'll need to delete everything from your /Documents/My Games/Skyrim
path first. The same folder where tesv.exe and the Data folder are found in. 

Once you've done that then copy all of my Skyrim files into the same folder.
Afterwards you'll want to copy my skyrim.ini and skyrimprefs.ini into your
/My Documents/My Games/Skyrim folder.

This Overhaul is extremely compatible with itself. There are no problems or
glitches between the mods I've placed that I can tell. You can always contact me if 
there is an issue. 

It also already has script extenders and other commonly required content when 
adding mods that alter animation, gameplay, dialogue, sounds, whatever it may be.

Everything is already set up for you, the only thing you might need to do is
turn up/down the Texture Quality in the options menu or some of the other Qualities.
It's the menu when you launch SkyrimLauncher.exe (NOT skse_loader.exe).

Don't mess the distances in the View Distance tab unless your game is seriously
running too slow. 

Part of this Overhaul is that it puts in a lot different features to make the 
game feel more real. While also adding a lot of cool things to make the game even
more enjoyable without making it any easier. Take a look at the different features 
from the mod list. I haven't had any trouble with compatibility.

You'll have a lot of fun with this, so try it all out before you begin adding 
anything to it.
 
After that you can just start the game. The skse_loader.exe is the launcher you 
need for Skyrim to launch now. The SkyrimLauncher.exe won't do anything other than 
show you the options menu before the game starts.

As always, give the game time when installing mods. Once you've finally gotten to a
spot out of the intro, Wait for a Day or so in GameTime. It just helps everything
settle and prevents crashing. 






P.S. As a lovely gift, Don't go too crazy with Serana... New Look, More Dialogue, New Abilities, and Now Marriable.






I will add a F.A.Q. once I get some questions






I don't know much about computers but I'll give you the basic specs I see.
With my Computer specs this game runs more than perfect so don't worry if you have 
less. And be happy if you have more, because you can turn up the quality even more.

Motherboard: Asus ASUS M5A97 LE R2.0
Processor: AMD FX-4350 Vishera Quad-Core 4.2 GHz
Graphics Card: MSI GeForce GT 730 DirectX 12 N730K-1GD5LP/OC Core Clock 1006 MHz
               1GB 64-Bit GDDR5
Memory: G.SKILL Ripjaws X Series 16GB (2 x 8GB) Speed 1866
author: Not My Mods Just My Mix
